nodes.bodyText: Just curious, what block uses this?
Cobwebs and the nether vines....which makes me realize there's a slight error here. it should be silk touch OR shears. Fixed in latest commit.
it's what the class is called.
Ah, thought the return type is the built type, not the self type.

I know this is a vanilla-inspired name, but EXPLOSION_IMMUNE is a little confusing imo, however I can't think of a better name either so I guess it's fine, especially since it's one commonly seen in the json anyway
